feature.label: PSORTb
feature.description: This App is based on the PSORTb 3.0, a prediction tool for bacterial protein subcellular localization predictions. This App is based on the PSORTb 3.0, a prediction tool for bacterial protein subcellular localization predictions. If you use this tool for your research please cite: PSORTb 3.0: improved protein subcellular localization prediction with refined localization subcategories and predictive capabilities for all prokaryotes. N.Y. Yu, J.R. Wagner, M.R. Laird, G. Melli, S. Rey, R. Lo, P. Dao, S.C. Sahinalp, M. Ester, L.J. Foster, and F.S.L. Brinkman (2010) Bioinformatics 26(13):1608-1615. For more information please visit: http://www.psort.org
feature.license: This App is based on the command-line version of PSORTb which is available uder the GNU General Public Licence (GNU GPL). http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt
